trailingComments.value: First, include some global resources which will be added in all imports at the top.

leadingComments.value: First, include some global resources which will be added in all imports at the top.

trailingComments.value: Then, include any found agent style extensions present in the system. These need to be loaded first in order to be
given chance to override the variables used later by the agent styles.

leadingComments.value: Then, include any found agent style extensions present in the system. These need to be loaded first in order to be

trailingComments.value: Finally, add all agent styles to the list.

comments.value: This software comes with ABSOLUTELY NO WARRANTY. For details, see
the enclosed file COPYING for license information (GPL). If you
did not receive this file, see https://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl-3.0.txt.
First, include some global resources which will be added in all imports at the top.
Then, include any found agent style extensions present in the system. These need to be loaded first in order to be
given chance to override the variables used later by the agent styles.
Finally, add all agent styles to the list.

Finally, add all agent styles to the list.
